entries.femaleVariant: Reports of a heated exchange in Santo Domingo between the 6th Street gang and Night City's finest. But who shot first? Depends who you ask.
In other news, Hanako Arasaka sailed in at dawn on her aircraft carrier! But just what could the heiress to the corporate throne want in Night City?
And now, a shout-out to all the lowlifes over at the Atlantis. Ladies and gents, here's that all-time classic from Johnny Silverhand – "Chippin' In."
Hello, Night City! Stan the man, here, and boy, was last night a scorcher!
NCPD's placed Watson on lockdown. Official word to locals – it's a drill, but I'd take that with a generous pinch of salt.
If you're down in Wats and see the NCPD doing what it does best, holler at your man Stan. We're one call away from the truth.
